Articles.Content:
Then it's a paradox.

*twitch* Try 'irony'.

Kerbals can control themselves! They can laugh or scream or twitch. They just defer to our superior judgement and orders and limb-forcing robot exoskeletons.

Error 101.

What if the KSP did not exist?
then danny2462 would have no purpose in life

Then everything would be the same.

What if the poster above me actualy posted a what-if?

then history would change,.

what if I was not the afore mention poster above

There would be snow in the Sahara.

Is there somebody posting at the same time as me?? O_O

What if there was no Metal Slug?

Edited September 29, 2014 by Overfloater

Then mrpamplemousse would not exsist.

What if Kkat wrote FO:E 2.

As the only person who really knows who that is other than that kraken, it would be popular.

What if you hadn't refrenced ponies?

Then you wouldn't have replied

What if I hadn't remade all the old forum games.

Then someone else would make them.

What if NASA was fully funded?

Apollo Block X would be in operation.

What if the Space Shuttle was successful?

We would be colonising mars.

What if we could read minds through the internet?

Everyone who did it would get PTSD within a week.

What if Windows 8 was good?

Then ...everyone would use it? Everyone already does use it. Except for the ones that don't, obviously.

Then everyone would stop complaining about it.

What if I checked out 20 books from the library?

*twitch* Try 'irony'.

Kerbals can control themselves! They can laugh or scream or twitch. They just defer to our superior judgement and orders and limb-forcing robot exoskeletons.

But if mythbusters is a myth and myths are false facts thought to be true then it would not exist so it could not be a myth...

..you broke the continuity Labhouse !

Let me make my own then :

What if humans invaded the Kerbol system ?

They would take over Kerbin and stop funding the space program.

What if the Kerbal space program was no longer funded?

Death rates would lower by a whopping 85%!

What if humans were invertebrates?

They would look like gelatinous green slime.

What if Danny2462 took over the NASA, the ESA, the Jaxa, and all other space launching agencies ?

Edited October 1, 2014 by MegaUZI
Forgot the question mark.

"Hm..what would happen if we blew up all this fuel? Let's see..." *BOOM* *mushroom cloud rises in distance* "Aw..what happened to the space center? This is no fun!"

What if milk didn't exist?

Then mammalian biology would work a lot differently.

What if, instead of just a capsule icon, KSP showed a tiny, low-detail model of your current vessel in the map view?

Then map view would be laggy.

What if GreeningGalaxy was a robot?

Then he would be ill cause he caught a virus.(See what I did there?)

What if mankind spoke in puns?

II think GreeningGalaxy is a girl and there would be mass murder from me being annoyed

what if MGUARN didn't think GreeningGalaxy was not a girl?

Then he would thing GG was a F.

What if I wasn't in the 49th state?
